channel.title: Req] Essay [Req
channel.description:
I have an essay due in on next Monday, it is all about a confession, i have to write an essay on my confession, why i did it when i did it, like a running commentry really. And i know i will fail as i suck at building tension and running commentry storys. And it is in 1st person. It has to be i think 400-500 words long But more is allways better :) As i said it is in for monday the 9th of october. And i will be so gratefull if anyone takes there time to write this. I can also do it myself if no-body would like to. Please reply as soon as possible so i know were i stand.
And a suggestion for the essay. It could be about me killing my best friends mum or something. And it has to be a running commentry. And punctuation please.
Once again thanks for anyone who even attempts it.

item.title: Req] Essay [Req

item.description:
@leader wrote:

I will attempt to write it, but I cannot guarantee that it will be completed or even started. I am on a tight schedule; I have too much homework and many tests.
